MS MCQs

    Foundations of cloud computing for administrators - Cloud use cases

    »

    1. Which of the following scenarios is NOT one that lends itself to a cloud-computing solution?

      You work at an animation firm that uses banks of servers equipped with GPUs to render scenes for movies.

      You are training a convolutional neural network with tens of thousands of images to enable it to determine whether scanned documents contain redactions.

      You want to consolidate unused bandwidth on thousands of personal computers and lease it to customers.

      Your company has terabytes of data that it wishes to archive in at least two geographic locations to minimize the chance of losing the data.

      Your company runs an online retail operation in which demand varies at different times of day and different times of year.

      The marketing department has asked you to write an application that uses AI to monitor Twitter and alert them if tweets targeting the company turn negative.
